organic.title: Nathan Adelson Hospice
organic.snippet: The Elaine Wynn Palliative Care Program focuses on relieving and preventing pain, symptoms and stress. Our goal is improved quality of life for you and your ...

organic.title: Info for Patients & Families - Nathan Adelson Hospice
organic.snippet: Nathan Adelson Hospice offers palliative, or comfort, rather than curative treatment. Under the direction of a Physician, hospice uses sophisticated methods of ...

organic.title: Camp Erin - Nathan Adelson Hospice
organic.snippet: Camp Erin is a special three-day camp designed for children and teens ages 6-17 who have experienced the death of someone close to them.

organic.title: What is Palliative Care? - Nathan Adelson Hospice
organic.snippet: Both palliative care and hospice care provide comfort. Palliative care can begin at diagnosis and can coincide with treatment for a disease.

organic.title: Center for Compassionate Care - Nathan Adelson Hospice
organic.snippet: The Center for Compassionate Care provides emotional and spiritual support to our community. Groups include bereavement services for adults and children.
